item.title: Learning To Code
item.description: Executing Your First Code Deciding which programming language to learn is often the most difficult decisions to make. C++? Java? Dogescript? Learning to program is 90% about the principles and 10% about the languages, so don’t stress about which one you choose. Granted, there are languages that are more difficult to learn than others. While something like C++ is ultimately where your journey will take you, it’s also well known for its steep learning curve.
